1.text: Keep separate boxes of baking soda for deodorizing, household cleaning and baking.

2.text: Buy baking soda in a box.

3.text: Place the box in a resealable plastic bag after you open the cardboard baking soda box.

4.text: Push all of the air out of the plastic bag.

5.text: Keep the bagged baking soda box in a dry place.

6.text: Choose a storage place that will stay cool.

7.text: Keep baking soda away from strong spices and odors.

8.text: Remove the baking soda from its storage place before using.

9.text: Store baking soda in this way for 2 to 3 years.

10.text: Use dry measuring spoons whenever you remove baking soda for a recipe.
